mapper.sql: STEP_ID, MODEL_ID, COMP_ID, STEP_SEQ, SEQ_SORT, TIMELIMIT, TIMELIMIT_TYPE, RPEVSTEP_ID, RPEVSTEP_NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from MODEL_STEP_RELATE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

MODEL_ID,

SEQ_SORT,
TIMELIMIT,
TIMELIMIT_TYPE,

mapper.update:
update MODEL_STEP_RELATE
STEP_ID = #{record.stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODEL_ID = #{record.modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STEP_SEQ = #{record.stepSeq,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SEQ_SORT = #{record.seqSort,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TIMELIMIT = #{record.timelimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TIMELIMIT_TYPE = #{record.timelimitType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
RPEVSTEP_ID = #{record.rpevstepId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RPEVSTEP_NAME = #{record.rpevstepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update MODEL_STEP_RELATE set STEP_ID = #{record.stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODEL_ID = #{record.modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STEP_SEQ = #{record.stepSeq,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SEQ_SORT = #{record.seqSort,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TIMELIMIT = #{record.timelimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIMELIMIT_TYPE = #{record.timelimitType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, RPEVSTEP_ID = #{record.rpevstepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RPEVSTEP_NAME = #{record.rpevstepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.STEP_ID, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.STEP_NAME, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.COMP_ID, MODEL_STEP_RELATE.TIMELIMIT_TYPE, MODEL_STEP_RELATE.TIMELIMIT, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.EXECUTOR_TYPE, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.EXECUTOR, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.EXECUTOR_NAME, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.IS_SYSTEM, MODEL_STEP_RELATE.RPEVSTEP_ID, MODEL_STEP_RELATE.RPEVSTEP_NAME, PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.STEP_NO,MODEL_STEP_RELATE.STEP_SEQ FROM MODEL_STEP_RELATE LEFT JOIN PROCESS_MODEL_STEP ON MODEL_STEP_RELATE.STEP_ID = PROCESS_MODEL_STEP.STEP_ID WHERE MODEL_STEP_RELATE.MODEL_ID = #{modelId} ORDER BY MODEL_STEP_RELATE.STEP_SEQ
SELECT FROM MODEL_STEP_RELATE WHERE COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND MODEL_ID = #{param.modelId} AND STEP_ID = #{param.stepId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MODEL_STEP_RELATE WHERE COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND MODEL_ID = #{param.modelId} AND STEP_ID = #{param.stepId} AND STEP_SEQ = #{param.stepSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MODEL_STEP_RELATE SET STEP_SEQ=STEP_SEQ-1 WHERE COMP_ID =#{param.compId} AND MODEL_ID = #{param.modelId} AND STEP_ID = #{param.stepId} AND STEP_SEQ > #{param.stepSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MODEL_STEP_RELATE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND MODEL_ID = #{modelId}
mapper.select: select count(1) FROM MODEL_STEP_RELATE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND STEP_ID = #{stepId}
